## Libraries
```{r}
library(GA)
```

## Population
```{r}
numbers_and_operators <- c("10", "25", "100", "5", "3", "+", "-", "/", "*")
operator_min <- 6
operator_max <- 9
n_numbers <- 5
final_value <- 2512
```

## Generate population
```{r}
generate_agent <- function() {
  operator_indices <- round(runif(n_numbers - 1, operator_min, operator_max))
  number_indices <- sample(1:(operator_min - 1), 5)
  indices <- vector(mode = "list", length = 9)
  o_index <- 0
  for (variable in 1:n_numbers) {
    # for setting the numbers
    indices[2 * variable - 1] <- number_indices[variable]
    # for setting operators
    if (variable != n_numbers)
      indices[variable * 2] <- operator_indices[o_index <- o_index + 1]
  }
  array(unlist(indices))
}
```

## Fitness function
```{r}
fitness <- function(agent) {
  a <- numbers_and_operators[agent]
  print(a)
  val <- eval(parse(text = paste(a, collapse = "")))
  abs(val - final_value)
}

fitness(generate_agent())
```
